title: A detailed guide on how  to start a meme war
body:
Step one post this.
http://i.imgur.com/IEod42u.gif?noredirect 

Step two find a safe place.
http://66.media.tumblr.com/9c5ca028aed920d88a34657c8d856202/tumblr_mospdeZLfN1rcy99do1_500.gif

Step three enjoy the show.
http://pre02.deviantart.net/64b1/th/pre/i/2016/004/c/4/mordekaiser_sticker_by_nimrohd-d9mqzyy.jpg





Discaimer I'm not responsible for a angry raptors trying to eat you if you follow this guide. 
http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view6/2184424/interesting-raptor-o.gif

replies.body:
Oh thank goodness it's not a morde thr- \*gets to third image\* - OH FOR F...

EDIT: Oh wait, you're not Malicious Metal. GET OUTTA HERE WITH THAT!
